settings.title: Trade Tools & Supplies for Broadstairs Professionals
settings.paragraph_1: Broadstairs combines charming period properties along Viking Bay with modern developments inland — and both keep local tradespeople busy. Our Ramsgate branch is a quick 10-minute drive from the town centre, stocking the professional Makita and DeWalt ranges that serious tradespeople depend on. No need to drive to Canterbury or order blind online.
settings.paragraph_2: From the handsome Victorian villas along the clifftops to the newer estates around Westwood Cross, Broadstairs' property market drives steady demand for quality building work. We supply the tools and consumables for every stage — demolition, first fix, second fix and finishing. Cordless kits, saw blades, drill bits, fixings, adhesives, PPE — it's all on the shelf at our Ramsgate counter.
settings.paragraph_3: Many Broadstairs traders combine their Ramsgate branch visit with a materials run to the nearby builders' merchants on Manston Road. We're open 7:30–17:00 weekdays and Saturday mornings, and we offer free delivery over £30 to CT10 postcodes.

settings.title: Need Tools in Broadstairs?
settings.subtitle: Call our Ramsgate branch for expert advice, or shop online with free delivery over £30.
